Disha Patani Age | Movies | Photos | Wiki | Biography | Family | Education

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Disha Patani is an Indian Film Actress and former Fashion Model. She is one of the most beautiful Indian Film Actress and model, she works in Bollywood and Telugu Film Industry. Disha entered the film industry recently but this few timing she established herself as a leading & commercial successful actress of Bollywood. She is one of the few Bollywood celebrities that we frequently spot without makeup. She is beautiful and nothing less even without her makeup.

Biography & Wiki

Disha Patani’s Nickname is Disha. She was born on 27 July 1995 in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India. Hence, her current age is 24 years. Disha Patani’s Zodiac is Leo. Her hometown is Tanakpur, Uttarakhand, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Disha’s height in feet is 5′ 7″. Also, her height in Centimeters is 170 cm.

Family and Relatives

Disha Patani’s father’s name is Jagdish Singh Patani who is a DSP in the Uttar Pradesh Police Department. Her mother’s name is Not Known. She has an elder sister named Khushboo Patani who is a Captain in the Indian Army. Her brother’s name is Suryansh Patani.

Affairs, Boyfriends and Marital Status

There was a buzz that, Disha had a relationship with “Kasautii Zindagi Kay” star Parth Samthaan. Currently, Disha is dating with actor and co-star from Tiger Shroff. As per media, the couple is very serious about their relationship.

Education and School, College

Disha completed her graduation in Computer Science and Engineering from Amity University, Lucknow. She became runner’s up of Miss India Indore in 2013.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Salary and Net Worth

Disha Patanihas estimated net worth of almost Net Worth Rs.50 Crore. She earns Rs.2 Crore from Average Movie as salary. Furthermore, Her Brand Endorsement Fee is Rs.1 Crore and her Personal Investments Rs.15 Crore.

Filmography

Disha Patani entered the film industry recently but this few timing she established herself as a leading & commercial successful actress of Bollywood. She is one of the few Bollywood celebrities that we frequently spot without makeup. She is beautiful and nothing less even without her makeup. Disha entered the film industry recently but this few timing she established herself as a leading & commercial successful actress of Bollywood.

Disha beautiful Indian Film Actress and model, she works in Bollywood and Telugu Film Industry. She was made her screen debut in 2015 with Telugu Film Loafer as Mouni and First Hindi Movie M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (2016). M.S. Dhoni was a massive hit with the collections of ₹ 2.16 Billion emerging to be the highest-grossing film for both Sushant Singh Rajput and Disha.

She worked in Jackie Chan’s film Kung Fu Yoga (2017) which was an Indo-Chinese Film. Disha then acted in Baaghi 2 along with Tiger Shroff, a sequel to 2016 hit Baaghi also starring Tiger Shroff along with Shraddha Kapoor. Produced by Sajid Nadiadwala and directed by Ahmed Khan, the film was released on 30 March 2018 worldwide.

Disha appeared in a music video, Befikra along with Tiger Shroff which was produced by Bhushan Kumar and Krishan Kumar under T-Series and composed by Meet Bros. Also, Written and directed by Meet Bros, the singer, Aditi Singh Sharma lent her voice. There is a rumor about her and Tiger Shroff’s relationship. They might not have openly admitted to their rumored relationship, but the two have been spotted several times at dinner outings while cozying up to each other.

Contact Address

Controversies

In 2012, she said in a video that she is 20 years old with the date of birth 13 June 1992. But in 2016 she said that she is 20 years old with the date of birth 27 July 1995.

Facts about Disha Patani

  • Before appearing in movies she has appeared in several ad films including Garnier, Diary Milk, Snapdeal and Aircel.
  • She is a computer engineer by education
  • Disha Patani loves to drive. She has often seen driving cars while hanging out with friends.
  • Earlier, Disha was finalized for Baaghi opposite to Tiger but then the role was gone to Shraddha Kapoor.
  • During the initial part of her career, she worked with global star Jackie Chan in the movie ‘Kung Fu Yoga’. It is believed that Jackie was so impressed with her fitness and workout regime that he actually gifted her a personalized jacket with his name on it.
  • Disha Patani and her alleged boyfriend Tiger Shroff share the same trainer who hails from Odisha
  • She learned asuri a tribal lingo of Jharkhand for Dhoni’s biopic.
  • She was dating Parth Samthaan previously. But She Dumped him because she found proof of his relationship with Vikas Gupta.
  • She is an avid animal lover and has two dogs named “Bella” and “Goku” and a cat named “Jasmine.” She has been trolled on social media for naming one of her dogs “Goku” by the fans of Dragon Ball series; as “Goku” happens to be a fictional character in the series.
  • Disha and Nora Fatehi are good friends.
